name: Counter Measure
description:
Counter Measure

Made in 48 hours for the 2023 Global Game Jam with the theme Roots

A dangerous virus has taken control of the root directory. As the last security measure left, you must navigate through the cyber space directories and defeat the bugs and infectors who have spread throughout it. Make your way up to the root director (/) to destroy the virus who is source. But beware, the virus can learn from actions and perform counter measures to disrupt you strategies.

CONTROLS:

Accelerate - Spacebar/W

Aim - Mouse

Fire - LClick

Bomb - RClick

Tools Used:

Game Engine: Unity

Music Software: Pico-8

Art Software: REXPaint
